text: Latirulus is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Species== Species within the genus Latirulus include: * Latirulus craticulatus (Linnaeus, 1758): synonym of Turrilatirus craticulatus) * Latirulus fasciatus Habe & Okutani, 1968 * Latirulus melvilli]' (Schepman, 1911): synonym of Turrilatirus melvilli'' * Latirulus nagasakiensis (Smith, 1880): synonym of Turrilatirus nagasakiensis (E.A. Smith, 1880) * Latirulus turrita (Gmelin, 1791): synonym of Turrilatirus turritus (Gmelin, 1791) ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae
title: Latirulus
